topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body: Speaking of sexuality in mass media I honestly can't think of a negative side effect for the rising amount of sex and nudity on television.  What I mean by this is that if you take out every "think of the children" argument people against it have there's no real downside to it in that while it does have a minor effect on society's views on sex they fullblown overblow it to absurd levels.  Hypothetically let's say the FCC allows fullblown porn over the airwaves and basic cable would that really effect society in any noticeable way?  It's like the people that go "think of the children" never realized there's such a thing as the internet or that the internet is for porn.
